Text: I have played new game after this patch and i come to "Navigator" rank.Then during video game freeze for a few seconds and then it crash to desctop.

For anyone who feels like messing around; according to the steam forums the random chrashing (Usually when entering a port) is due to dual cores. Only using one core for the game makes it more stable, yet still slightly prone to chrashing.

I cant install the patch, msi installer box says that something is wrong with my installer or that I have to re-install the game. But I have tried that, but just keeps happening. Samething with the 1.1 patch.
Nevermind, fixed it. Had to re-install the game again for some reason?
I own a single core P4 D 3 ghz with XP and it kept crashing on me when entering ports... Same with my laptop, which is dual core 1.8 Vista...

For those for whom the game crashes on start-up, if you have multiple monitors, only enable one.

Hope that helped.
What about new updates? They already released 1.1.3 and 1.1.4 ....

ANYONE KNOWS WHEN THE 1.1.3 UPDATE IS OUT?
it improves major stuff from the gameplay, without the update the game becomes really annoying
Thanks for the upload, is there anyway that you can help uploading the v1.1.4 patch for us ? :)
can any1 help me with a product key

@harmze: read above.

Option 2:

If you prefer an untouched exe and absolutely adore keygens, install
the update and use the keygen from the KEYGEN folder, also included
with this release.

@Ultra-Tron

It's a known and common problem on dual-core processors.

On the compatibility tab of the PortRoyale3.exe check:
- Disable visual themes
- Disable desktop composition

Enjoy!
